Actionbound is an app for playing digital scavenger hunts by means of installing digital content in the physical world. 

The content is filled in by the users on the website actionbound.com making actual surroundings a backdrop for the game. We call these interactive mobile rallies “Bounds”, essentially a collection of diverse tasks, e.g., taking pictures, dancing, playing a game etc., linked to a specific location. 

The program quite literally augments our reality by enhancing peoples’ real-life interaction whilst using their smart phones and tablets. Apart from the altruistic goal of helping people to discover “their environment by learning more about its history, politics and culture”, the free app is payable for corporate clients, who can use Actionbound for team-building events and the likes.

Actionbound is an interactive app-based game approach for smart phones and tablets: Players are invited to accomplish tasks, which can be defined through the so-called Bound-Creator on the website actionbound.com, in order to playfully discover their environment by learning more about its history, politics and culture. In contrast to a geo-cache or a scavenger hunt Actionbound requires the players to create their own content.

About Arduino Science Journal
With the Arduino Science Journal, you can learn interactively, conduct experiments and iterate on findings.

•  Enhance your existing lesson plans: use the Science Journal with activities and assignments you have already prepared
•  Classroom & home-school friendly: you don’t have to be in a classroom setting to start exploring. The Arduino Science Journal can be used to run experiments straight away, as long as you have your smartphone or tablet with you!

Description
Roadie Coach is the first and only AI-based guitar and ukulele learning app that listens to you play and guides you with customized feedback, just like what a music teacher would do. This app will help you hit the perfect chords, keep a tight rhythm, and play your favorite songs in full. Coach is a fast and easy way to practice, master and learn both ukulele and guitar while having a fair bit of fun in the process.

PICK YOUR FAVORITE SONG TO LEARN
• Choose from our growing list of popular tunes!

PRACTICE & MASTER YOUR CHORDS
For every chord in the song, this app will:
• Show you exactly how to position your fingers on the fretboard
• Listen to you strum each chord and gives you instant feedback on the accuracy of the notes
• Challenge you to learn the chord fully before you can move on to the next one

PRACTICE STRUMMING PATTERNS
Your next step will be to set the tempo and start practicing your strumming!
• Strum along with the on-screen guide
• Follow the increasing tempo until you can strum at the original tempo of the song

PRACTICE THE WHOLE SONG
Now put it all together and hear the song take shape!
• Play along with ease as lyrics, chords, and strum patterns move along to the rhythm of the song
• Get instant feedback with your overall score, rhythm score, and chords score to know what you need to continue practicing
Roadie Coach makes it fun to learn new songs and helps you progress one level at a time.
Move through each of the stages of learning a song by perfecting your technique and crushing that song score. Our app’s simple interface will get you progressing in no time!

WHO IS IT FOR?
Roadie Coach has been developed by a team of experienced musicians. It is ideal for self-learning or to practice while learning with a teacher. If you are any of the below, then this app is definitely for you:
• Complete beginner
• Interested in learning ukulele or guitar tabs
• Intermediate musician
• Ukulele or guitar teacher

DOWNLOAD OUR OTHER APP
• Roadie Tuner app - to tune all your string instruments.

GET SUPPORT
For any questions or suggestions on how to help make the app better, contact us on support@bandindustries.com.

ABOUT BAND INDUSTRIES
Band Industries is dedicated to building the next generation musician’s toolkit. The company’s first product, the Roadie Tuner, was launched in 2013 and garnered worldwide attention and accolades, including the TechCrunch Disrupt 2014 Audience Choice Award. In 2017, Band Industries successfully released their more advanced product, Roadie 2, followed by Roadie Bass in 2018. Recently, Band Industries launched a successful Kickstarter for their most recent iteration of their tuner, Roadie 3. The developers have also released several useful apps for musicians: Roadie Tuner, Roadie Bass Tuner and are now reaching their next milestone with Roadie Coach.
